results.content: I like the fact that the training was what I actually wanted. No lengthy explanation, just a practical step to achieve my goal to setup a EOS node
results.content_html: I like the fact that the training was what I actually wanted. No lengthy explanation, just a practical step to achieve my goal to setup a EOS node

results.content: I enjoyed it very much, was a bit jumbled though job well done !
results.content_html: I enjoyed it very much, was a bit jumbled though job well done !

results.content:
What I like about this course is that the instructor has set up a straight to the point exercise for you to run over and over again on your own time.

You won't get the build right on your first try, but a key thing regarding setting up the node.  Use Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, when I used version 18 I couldn't get past the eosio build command.  After using 16.04 everything started to work perfectly as the instructor said.  Its probably fixed by now, but I still use 16.04.

After playing with the codes and installation, I feel comfortable setting up a node to talk with the main net. 

Im kinda pleased regarding the website talking with scatter wallet.  I'll do my own thing with the code but I found it simple and easy to use, it will help me with other projects.

Good Course for Beginners :)
